ATutor Handbook

Most of the ATutor documentation is found within ATutor itself in the form of the ATutor Handbook. Follow the link in the footer area of each ATutor installation to find the handbook. Or, follow the context sensitive help through the handbook link while using a tool in ATutor. These links lead to the handbook in single, printable pages.

  • User Handbook
  • Instructor Handbook
  • Administrator Handbook
